about_the_game:
Disgraced

The Renegade Pack DLC lets you start off ahead of the curve with some extra items to help you in your adventures!
Renegade Pack DLC:
  • 1x Katana (weapon)
  • 1x Sarubeji Do (armor)
  • 10x Ryo (money)
  • 10x Materials (building resources)
  • 10x Rations (food)
  • 10x Supplies (weapons and armor)
  • 10x Influence (reputation)
  • 1x Mastery Journal (experience)
  • 2x Bandages (healing item)
  • 1x Poultice (healing item)
  • 1x Pottage (provisions item)

PLEASE NOTE: IN ORDER TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK, YOU MUST ACCESS THE SUPPLY CACHE IN YOUR HEAD QUARTERS IN KIBO. YOU CAN GET THE ITEMS ANYTIME YOU WISH! YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!

PLEASE NOTE: IN ORDER TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK, YOU MUST ACCESS THE SUPPLY CACHE IN YOUR HEAD QUARTERS IN KIBO. YOU CAN GET THE ITEMS ANYTIME YOU WISH! YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
name: Disgraced Renegade Pack DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
